channel.title: I need help with my source
channel.description: what is the id code for the general for bandos in an allstar based source?

item.title: I need help with my source
item.dc:creator: @Jack_Bower Jack Bower
item.description:
@Jack_Bower wrote:

Go into your Client files. Find your N.P.C. definition class (probably around class 5 if you’re using Allstar). Once you open the class you’ll want to be looking for custom N.P.C. information.

if (i == 19) {
	CLASSNAME.actions = new String[5];
	CLASSNAME.actions[1] = "Attack";
	CLASSNAME.combatLevel = #;
	CLASSNAME.name = "THE NAME OF THE NPC YOU'RE LOOKING FOR WILL BE LIKE THIS";
}

It probably won’t look anything like mine, but that gives you a general idea of what to look for. You can always just open up the class and CTRL+F for “general”.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my source
